subject: Baseball
Diet and Nutrition
lead_paragraph: Teixeira attributed his early success at the plate this season to a new eating regimen he adopted this off-season, which included abstaining from junk food and reducing foods that might cause inflammation.
snippet: Teixeira attributed his early success at the plate this season to a new eating regimen he adopted this off-season, which included abstaining from junk food and reducing foods that might cause inflammation.
